roleset.name: cut, shape, or form scallops
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class carve-21.2-2 and carve-21.2-1. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: cut or shape in scallops
example.text: [PRO] Scollop the hem of the dress.

roleset.name: fish for scallops
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class berry-13.7. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.
